amendatorysection.para: The Department of Banking and Finance has power to make such rules and regulations for the government of all associations of the character defined in sections 8-301 to 8-340.01 as may, in its judgment, seem wise and expedient.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XIX, § 26, p. 734;

crossreference.para: For adoption and promulgation of administrative rules, see Administrative Procedure Act, section 84-920.
